title: cannot divide a Variable by its sum
body_html:
Dear,
give the code:

a=Variable(torch.randn(5, 5))
b=a.sum()
c=a/b

I have the error:

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in
File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/autograd/variable.py", line 716, in div
return self.div(other)
File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/autograd/variable.py", line 318, in div
return Div()(self, other)
File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/autograd/_functions/basic_ops.py", line 47, in forward
return a.div(b)
RuntimeError: inconsistent tensor size at /home/soumith/local/builder/wheel/pytorch-src/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c:657

with tensors this does not happen. This works fine:

a=torch.randn(5, 5)
b=a.sum()
c=a/b

c=a/b

b=a.sum()

body:
Dear,
give the code:
```
a=Variable(torch.randn(5, 5))
b=a.sum()
c=a/b
```
I have the error:

> Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/autograd/variable.py", line 716, in __div__
    return self.div(other)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/autograd/variable.py", line 318, in div
    return Div()(self, other)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/autograd/_functions/basic_ops.py", line 47, in forward
    return a.div(b)
RuntimeError: inconsistent tensor size at /home/soumith/local/builder/wheel/pytorch-src/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c:657

with tensors this does not happen. This works fine:
```
a=torch.randn(5, 5)
b=a.sum()
c=a/b
```
